content: *blanket + scarf = blarf* the stashbuster blarf is a large-sized packable and cozy scarf that can be used as a light blanket in a pinch the pattern is designed to use up all those delicious little balls of leftover yarn that we can t bear to get rid of this design offers wide latitude for improvisation depending in the amount and type of yarn at hand and your own tastes and preferences version 2 is now available with written instructions as well as charts
